About Archive

Hi, I'm Philip

I'm a Christian, a UX/UI designer (some would say Product Designer), a coffee geek, and a gadget fan who lives in Cheltenham, UK. This is my blog, a creative outlet to mess around and play with. A place to show my work. A place that logs my thoughts and inspirations.
